com.orsoncharts.graphics3d

Class LabelFace

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.orsoncharts.graphics3d.Face
      • com.orsoncharts.graphics3d.LabelFace

  • public class LabelFace
extends Face
    A face that carries a label (and is itself invisible).
    Since:
    1.3
